import React, { useState} from 'react'; import { Formik, Form } from 'formik'; import { TextField } from './TextField'; import * as Yup from 'yup'; export const Signup = () => { const validate = Yup.object({ firstName: Yup.string() .min(3, 'Must be 15 characters or less') .max(15, 'Must be 15 characters or less') .required('Required'), lastName: Yup.string() .max(20, 'Must be 20 characters or less') .required('Required'), email: Yup.string() .email('Email is invalid') .required('Email is required'), password: Yup.string() .min(6, 'Password must be at least 6 charaters') .required('Password is required'), confirmPassword: Yup.string() .oneOf([Yup.ref('password'), null], 'Password must match') .required('Confirm password is required'), }) return (
{ console.log(values) }} > {formik => (

Sign Up

)}
) }
